description: Enterprise techniques used by Dok, ATT&CK software S0281 v1.0
name: Dok (S0281)

techniques.comment: Dok uses AppleScript to create a login item for persistence.
Dok prompts the user for credentials.
Dok installs a root certificate to aid in man-in-the-middle actions.
Dok persists via a Launch Agent.
Dok persists via a login item.
Dok downloads and installs Tor via homebrew.
